summary: REQ-3 is implemented via a new shared helper that scans stages by smallest stageNumber to resolve an origin serial and formats team labels with a hyphenated prefix. Knockout views (KnockoutPage/FullSchedulePage) were updated to prefix real teams while preserving placeholders. Robin Round 2 match team display was updated (via roundRobinDisplayCode) to use the origin serial for stageNumber===2, but the diff is truncated for the main RoundRobinGroupTable UI so itâ€™s unclear whether *all* Robin Round 2 team occurrences (e.g., group tables) now consistently render the prefixed format.

missing_requirements.requirement: In Robin Round 2, any team displayed (including match listings) shows its originating group serial number in the format "<OriginGroup>-<OriginPosition> <TeamName>".
missing_requirements.reason: The diff shows Robin Round 2 match formatting updated in frontend/src/features/tournament/roundRobinDisplayCode.ts, but the Robin Round 2 group/team table component change is truncated and does not show actual rendering using the origin serial prefix. Therefore it cannot be confirmed that all Robin Round 2 UI locations (beyond match listings) were updated.

hallucinated_features.description: Apply origin-group-serial prefix formatting broadly to knockout team displays (not scoped specifically/only to Pre-Quarter Finals).
hallucinated_features.reason: REQ-2 requests updating Pre-Quarter Final screens/entries; the changes introduce a generic knockout team display formatter in both KnockoutPage and FullSchedulePage that appears to apply to any knockout round rendered there, not explicitly limited to the pre-quarter-final round.
